page.title: 18BUILDING CHANGES IN FORFAR
page.content: How Buildings Have Changed in Forfar ____________________________________ West Burgh School ! Police Station North School ! Wellbrae Primary South School ! Kirkriggs Primary East School ! Music Centre West School ! Langlands Primary Academy ! Chapelpark Primary ______________________________________ The 4{Primary Schools}shown above are all feeder schools for the new Forfar Academy, built on a new site on the outskirts of town in 1965, opened by the Queen Mother.In 1927 there were a lot of{family businesses}e.g.butchers, confectioners,clothiers,milliners etc. Now,like most towns we have a Co-op and supermarkets taking their place. Some family firms have survived, but the new high rates may close a few more.
